statements: SELECT * FROM employee_performance_evaluations;
SELECT evaluation_id, evaluation_score FROM employee_performance_evaluations WHERE evaluation_score > 4.5;
SELECT evaluation_id, evaluation_comments FROM employee_performance_evaluations WHERE evaluation_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM employee_performance_evaluations WHERE evaluation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT employee_id, AVG(evaluation_score) AS average_score FROM employee_performance_evaluations GROUP BY employee_id;
SELECT * FROM employee_performance_evaluations ORDER BY evaluation_date DESC, evaluation_score ASC
SELECT employee_id, evaluation_score FROM employee_performance_evaluations WHERE evaluation_score > 80
SELECT evaluation_id, employee_id, evaluation_date FROM employee_performance_evaluations WHERE evaluation_score < 70 ORDER BY evaluation_date
SELECT * FROM employee_performance_evaluations WHERE evaluation_comments LIKE '%positive%'
SELECT * FROM employee_performance_evaluations WHERE employee_id = 123
SELECT * FROM employee_evaluations ORDER BY evaluation_date DESC;
SELECT evaluation_id, employee_id FROM employee_evaluations WHERE performance_rating > 4;
SELECT employee_id, evaluation_date FROM employee_evaluations WHERE employee_id = 123;
SELECT evaluation_id, performance_rating FROM employee_evaluations WHERE evaluation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT MAX(performance_rating) AS highest_rating FROM employee_evaluations;
SELECT * FROM employee_evaluations WHERE performance_rating > 4 ORDER BY employee_id DESC;
SELECT employee_id, evaluation_date FROM employee_evaluations WHERE performance_rating = 5 ORDER BY evaluation_date ASC;

SELECT e.employee_id, e.evaluation_date, h.comments FROM employee_evaluations e INNER JOIN evaluation_history h ON e.evaluation_id = h.evaluation_id WHERE e.performance_rating < 3 ORDER BY e.evaluation_date DESC;
SELECT e.employee_id, COUNT(h.history_id) AS total_evaluations FROM employee_evaluations e LEFT JOIN evaluation_history h ON e.evaluation_id = h.evaluation_id GROUP BY e.employee_id;
SELECT AVG(e.performance_rating) AS average_rating FROM employee_evaluations e WHERE e.evaluation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM employee_performance_evaluations;
SELECT employee_name, hire_date FROM employees;
SELECT evaluation_id, evaluation_score FROM employee_performance_evaluations WHERE evaluation_score > 80;
SELECT employee_name, department_id FROM employees ORDER BY department_id DESC;
SELECT employee_name, hire_date, department_id FROM employees WHERE hire_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department_id = 1 ORDER BY employee_name ASC
SELECT employee_id, employee_name FROM employees WHERE hire_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT evaluation_date, evaluation_score FROM employee_performance_evaluations WHERE evaluation_score > 80 ORDER BY evaluation_date DESC
SELECT e.employee_name, ep.progress_date, ep.progress_details FROM employees e JOIN evaluation_progress ep ON e.employee_id = ep.evaluation_id
SELECT e.employee_name, e.department_id, ep.progress_date FROM employees e LEFT JOIN evaluation_progress ep ON e.employee_id = ep.evaluation_id
SELECT * FROM evaluations;
SELECT employee_id, overall_rating, evaluation_date FROM evaluations ORDER BY evaluation_date DESC;
SELECT id, name, department FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT feedback_text FROM feedback WHERE feedback_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT evaluation_id, rating_type, rating_value FROM ratings ORDER BY rating_value DESC, evaluation_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM evaluations ORDER BY evaluation_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, AVG(overall_rating) AS average_rating FROM evaluations GROUP BY employee_id;
SELECT e.name, e.department, f.feedback_text FROM employees e JOIN feedback f ON e.id = f.evaluation_id WHERE f.feedback_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT r.rating_type, COUNT(r.id) AS rating_count FROM ratings r GROUP BY rating_type HAVING rating_count > 1;
SELECT e.name, COUNT(f.id) AS feedback_count FROM employees e LEFT JOIN feedback f ON e.id = f.evaluation_id GROUP BY e.name ORDER BY feedback_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM evaluations;
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name, department FROM employees;
SELECT evaluation_id, employee_id, performance_rating FROM evaluation_history ORDER BY evaluation_id DESC;
SELECT employee_id, evaluation_date, performance_rating FROM evaluations WHERE performance_rating > 4;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department='Engineering';
SELECT * FROM evaluations WHERE employee_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY evaluation_date DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, department FROM employees WHERE department = 'Finance' ORDER BY last_name, first_name;
SELECT department_name, COUNT(employee_id) AS total_employees FROM employees JOIN departments ON employees.department = departments.department_name GROUP BY department_name;
SELECT evaluation_id, employee_id, evaluation_date, performance_rating FROM evaluation_history WHERE evaluation_date >= '2021-01-01' AND performance_rating > 4 ORDER BY evaluation_date ASC;
SELECT employee_id, feedback_date, feedback_text FROM employee_feedback WHERE employee_id = 1 ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
